description.zh-cn: 中国药理学专家，中国科学院上海药物研究所研究员。其团队研发的阿尔茨海默症新药“九期一”及其相关论文曾引发学术造假争议。
description.en: A Chinese pharmacologist and researcher at the Shanghai Institute of Materia Medica, Chinese Academy of Sciences. The Alzheimer's new drug 'GV-971' developed by her team and its related papers have sparked controversy over academic fraud.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖副省级市，耿美玉的出生地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Geng Meiyu.

nodes.id: 中国科学院上海药物研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院上海药物研究所
en: Shanghai Institute of Materia Medica, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院下属的药物研究机构，耿美玉在此担任研究员。
description.en: A pharmaceutical research institute under the Chinese Academy of Sciences, where Geng Meiyu works as a researcher.

description.zh-cn: 一款由耿美玉团队研发的声称用于治疗阿尔茨海默症的新药，其有效性与研究数据存在争议。
description.en: A new drug developed by Geng Meiyu's team claimed to treat Alzheimer's disease, whose efficacy and research data are controversial.

description.zh-cn: 一个供科研人员匿名评论科学研究的网站，该网站上出现了对耿美玉团队论文的质疑。
description.en: A website that allows scientists to anonymously comment on scientific research, where questions were raised about papers from Geng Meiyu's team.

description.zh-cn: 中国神经生物学家，首都医科大学校长。曾实名举报耿美玉等人论文造假。
description.en: A Chinese neurobiologist and president of Capital Medical University. He once publicly reported Geng Meiyu and others for academic fraud.

description.zh-cn: 耿美玉获得医学学士和药理学硕士学位的母校。
description.en: The alma mater where Geng Meiyu received her bachelor's degree in medicine and master's degree in pharmacology.

description.zh-cn: 耿美玉获得药学博士学位的母校。
description.en: The alma mater where Geng Meiyu received her Ph.D. in pharmacy.

description.zh-cn: 耿美玉曾于1997年至2006年在此担任教授。
description.en: Geng Meiyu served as a professor here from 1997 to 2006.

nodes.id: 曹雪涛等人论文调查事件

zh-cn: 曹雪涛等人论文调查事件

description.zh-cn: 一起涉及多位中国科学家的论文数据可靠性争议事件，耿美玉是主要被调查者之一。
description.en: An event involving controversies over the reliability of paper data from several Chinese scientists, in which Geng Meiyu was one of the main subjects of investigation.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的医科大学，饶毅担任该校校长。
description.en: A medical university located in Beijing, China, where Rao Yi serves as president.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，与耿美玉、裴钢一同被饶毅实名举报论文造假。
description.en: A Chinese scholar who, along with Geng Meiyu and Pei Gang, was publicly reported by Rao Yi for academic fraud.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士，与耿美玉、李红良一同被饶毅实名举报论文造假。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences who, along with Geng Meiyu and Li Hongliang, was publicly reported by Rao Yi for academic fraud.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国科技部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科技部
en: Ministry of Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门之一，负责国家的科学技术工作。曾对饶毅举报耿美玉等人论文造假一事进行调查并发布结论。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the country's science and technology work. It investigated and issued conclusions on Rao Yi's report of academic fraud against Geng Meiyu and others.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

degree.en: Bachelor of Medicine, Master of Pharmacology

description.zh-cn: 1986年于山东医科大学获医学学士学位，1989年获药理学硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from Shandong Medical University with a bachelor's degree in medicine in 1986 and a master's degree in pharmacology in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 1997年毕业于日本东京大学药学部，获药学博士学位。
description.en: Graduated from the Faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences at the University of Tokyo, Japan, with a Ph.D. in Pharmaceutical Sciences in 1997.

relationships.target: 中国科学院上海药物研究所

description.zh-cn: 耿美玉的团队声称成功研发了治疗阿尔茨海默症的新药“九期一”。
description.en: Geng Meiyu's team claimed to have successfully developed 'GV-971', a new drug for Alzheimer's disease.

description.zh-cn: PubPeer网站对耿美玉课题组发表的4篇论文发出质疑，认为存在图片不当裁剪、一图多用等问题。
description.en: The PubPeer website raised questions about four papers published by Geng Meiyu's research group, suggesting issues such as improper image cropping and reusing images.

description.zh-cn: 2019年11月29日，饶毅实名举报耿美玉等人论文造假，称其文章“不造假是不可能的”。
description.en: On November 29, 2019, Rao Yi publicly reported Geng Meiyu and others for academic fraud, stating that it was 'impossible for her papers not to be fraudulent'.

description.zh-cn: 2019年11月29日，饶毅实名举报李红良、裴钢、耿美玉造假。
description.en: On November 29, 2019, Rao Yi publicly reported Li Hongliang, Pei Gang, and Geng Meiyu for fraud.

description.zh-cn: 2019年11月29日，饶毅实名举报李红良、裴钢、耿美玉造假。
description.en: On November 29, 2019, Rao Yi publicly reported Li Hongliang, Pei Gang, and Geng Meiyu for fraud.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国科技部

description.zh-cn: 2021年1月21日，中华人民共和国科技部发布调查结论，称耿美玉的论文未发现有造假，但存在“图片误用”。此结论为耿美玉澄清了最严重的造假指控。
description.en: On January 21, 2021, the Ministry of Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China released its investigation findings, stating that no fraud was found in Geng Meiyu's papers, but there was 'image misuse'. This conclusion cleared Geng Meiyu of the most serious allegations of fraud.

relationships.source: 曹雪涛等人论文调查事件

description.zh-cn: 耿美玉是“曹雪涛等人论文调查事件”中被调查的核心人物之一，该事件对其学术声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: Geng Meiyu was one of the key figures investigated in the 'Investigation into academic misconduct allegations against Cao Xuetao and others', and the event had a negative impact on her academic reputation.
